## forcedColorsStylesheetBehavior variable

This can be used to construct a behavior to apply a forced-colors only stylesheet.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
forcedColorsStylesheetBehavior: (styles: ElementStyles) => MatchMediaStyleSheetBehavior
```
